Padding and Margin
The class names follow a convention of margin/padding - top/bottom/left/right - amount. So for example, class='m-t-2' renders margin-top of 2, and class='p-b-5' renders padding-bottom of 5.
The accepted values are 0, 2, 5, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30
